pages.text: $(o)"The first spirits departed, and then The Storm was formed, the first spirits to become a god. $(br)They're angry, yes, but for how long? Nobody knows, and nobody can expect them. $(br)They might bring rain."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with the $(l:energy/entry_channeling)Channeling Tool$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Electricity$() aspect.
